verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: is] meeting with supporters and highlighting the benefits of the Republican tax law in Cleveland .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is [V: meeting] [ARG1: with supporters] and highlighting the benefits of the Republican tax law in Cleveland .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] is meeting with supporters and [V: highlighting] [ARG1: the benefits of the Republican tax law in Cleveland] .
